__e: Ok, it's not easy, that's why they're willing to pay $7 million cash.
The nitty gritty of this is - I've got three or four of our other clients that are, they're willing to pay a little bit more money than our current deal is.
But if these people were willing to do this to themselves, they must have had some insight into something we don't know.
Someone volunteered to be murdered? You have no idea how willing we are to do what is necessary for what is about to come.
I do feel like I have to go back and see what we're willing to do about that.
[Yorkey] You only know what they're willing to tell you and you only know what they're able to tell you.
Someone volunteered to be murdered? You have no idea how willing we are to do what is necessary for what is about to come.
Truth is, we don'T... know exactly what's going to happen to you, but we're willing to try, if you are.
